pathway_story: Arrived from a public middle school in Santa Monica, grew through Pacifica STEM coursework and leadership in athletics, then pursued engineering at USC.
Entered Pacifica from West LA, developed voice through PACARTS and student leadership, and continued creative studies at UCLA.
Moved from Inglewood to Pacifica, paired rigorous academics with service learning, and enrolled in a policy-focused college path.
Started in South LA schools, sharpened critical thinking in Pacifica humanities and debate, then advanced toward law and ethics studies.
